description:
Many managers underestimate the importance of being personable & approachable. Are you missing leadership opportunities because you're sending the wrong message to others? Make these changes & reach out to increase your “approachability” quotient.

Your business moves fast. Want to accelerate your team's performance to stay ahead & set a winning pace? Try coaching. Coaching helps your team reach performance goals & develops employees. Working together works better, so whether you're coaching star performers to achieve at the next level or guiding team members to unlock their true potential, discover the key skills you need to coach a winning performance.

Course 1: Be Approachable

Identify your own non-verbal habits & learn the skills to take your approachability to the next level.

  • Assess your own approachability
  • Recognize the non-verbal vibes you're sending
  • Be more interactive with better listening & understanding

Course 2: Coach as a Manager

Win with these coaching skills to take your team to the next level & unlock hidden potential.

Establish credibility with your team

Set expectations to assess performance

Give your team meaningful feedback

This two course bundle will teach you how to be the most approachable person you can be & leverage that approachability into a great coaching relationship with your team. It includes dynamic video, interactive practice lessons, tips from industry leaders, & downloadable PDFs. Each component is designed to be completed in short time allotments, or all at once, to suit your schedule. It will take approximately 1 hour to complete both courses.

You want to be the best team leader. Gain the tools you need to encourage interactions & coach your team to the next level.
title: Be Approachable & Coach as a Manager
